column2: "I heard the intel team twins talking about a dragon at the volcano, meow!"
"It's not too much to say that dragons are the strongest beings in RPGs, meow."
"If I defeat it with my coolness, surely I'll achieve my dream of having those twins petting me...*cough, cough*."
"M-make no mistake, everyone's in trouble with that kind of thing there, meow!"
"<%me>!! Will you go with me to punish that bastard, meow?!"
